name: PHASECullOption
desc: The actions the engine takes when it culls sound.

items.name: case terminate
items.desc: An option that culls sound by stopping playback.

items.name: case doNotCull
items.desc: An option that indicates the framework takes no action to cull sound.

items.name: case sleepWakeAtRealtimeOffset
items.desc: An option that pauses playback and resumes where it left off.

items.name: case sleepWakeAtZero
items.desc: An option that pauses playback and resumes at the beginning.

items.name: case sleepWakeAtRandomOffset
items.desc: An option that pauses playback and resumes at a random position.
